title: Context engineering over multimodal RAG
desc: Carbon-styled flow: strategy → components → assembly → analyzer → fusion → generation.

title: Integrated research mapping
desc: Venn of archival analysis, practice-based intervention, and computational modelling

title: Research brainstorm
desc: Context → Research question, Interpretivism and critical theory → Research question, and Taxonomic classification

title: Container Diagram
desc: Container-level view of frontend, backend, storage, and database with secure authentication and communication links.

title: Ingestion Sequence Diagram
desc: Sequence diagram of metadata ingestion: form validation, secure media upload, and confirmation from backend services.

title: IDE x DDR timeline
desc: Timeline of the transition from ID(E)RU to DDR, 1962–1986.

title: DDR activities
desc: Faceted overview of DDR activities across members, projects, and periods.

title: Risk heat map
desc: The risk heat map visualizes likelihood vs. impact where likelihood is the probability of an event occurring and impact is the magnitude of the consequence.

title: MRes radial map
desc: Synthesis of all the MRes keywords using dj3s radial mapping

title: PostgreSQL schema
desc: pgModeler schema of ddr_archive: top-left ingestion tables (alembic_version, items); middle band staff layer (agent_employment, core_agent, iso_639_language_codes); bottom ref_* authority grid (incl. ddr_category); top-right green block of yellow analytics views—our human-readable database map of live system.

title: Literature map
desc: A three-strand literature map showing how design methods, DDR historiography, and practice-led cybernetic design intersect, highlighting shared concerns around infrastructures, epistemic drift, and computational archives to frame the thesis’s conceptual terrain.
